key_risks: Market sensitivity due to focus on real estate and infrastructure
Intense competition from larger asset managers and passive investment products
Regulatory risks from changes in tax laws, securities regulations, or ESG mandates
Performance challenges with some funds underperforming benchmarks
Potential litigation and complaints impacting reputation and financial position
controversies: Potential for litigation and complaints affecting reputation and regulatory status
environmental_issues: ESG integration and compliance with environmental mandates
social_issues: Investor demand for sustainable investment options
governance_issues: Leadership transition with the retirement of William Scapell, Head of Fixed Income and Preferred Securities
